source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals
source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.

items.title: Landing Page Design and Principles
items.headline: Learn the principles of good landing page design to boost higher conversions
objectives_summary: Learn Principles of Landing page
Learn Mock up Design of Landing Page
Learn Basic of Adobe Photoshop

items.title: Business Growth Acceleration

visible_instructors.title: Nisandeh Neta
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Open Circles Academy and Open Circles Foundation
visible_instructors.name: Nisandeh

items.headline: Actionable strategies to price correctly, acquire clients and grow your business
objectives_summary: You will understand what you need to do for long-term business growth
You will learn how to plan smart and optimize project time and how to charge premium prizes without fear to maximize profitability
You will find out how to price your services to maximize your income and how to communicate with previous customers in order to acquire new ones

items.title: Growth Marketing: Strategy & Execution Bootcamp for Startups
items.headline: Master startup growth fundamentals & design a model that overdelivers your every goal
objectives_summary: Over 6 hours of video on startup growth fundamentals and modelling
Learn how to reverse-engineer your goals into a focused growth roadmap
Learn to define and optimize your Market, Product, Acquisition Channels and Business Model

items.title: Create your marketing strategy in 7 steps (with a template)
items.headline: Practical guide to build a marketing strategy for your startup or small business in 2019.
objectives_summary: You’ll build a ready-to-go marketing strategy
Choose effective marketing channels for your business
Market analysis & Benchmarking

items.title: How to Write Sales Copy
items.headline: Learn How To Create Compelling Sales Copy Without Experience
objectives_summary: Create top converting emails to increase engagement
Design powerful product reviews that stand out
Craft compelling headlines and sub headlines that demand attention

items.title: Masterclass in Marketing Psychology
items.headline: Create Viral Content | Get clients to say YES | Become a master Influencer | Make your business an 'overnight' success |
objectives_summary: How to create effective messaging for Marketing Campaigns: online and offline
How to advertise products for making the right impact
How to establish trust through body language

items.title: Marketing Management & Online Business: The Complete Course
items.headline: Learn How to Launch a Business Without Spending a Dime & Everything You Must Know To Succeed in Business Management
objectives_summary: Small business owners, Managers, Salespeople, Business students that want to improve their skills
You will learn the basic concepts of Marketing and why is important to follow effective strategies to get results
Understand how Business management works and how to be more productive

items.title: Customer Avatar – Attract Your Target Market & Sell More

visible_instructors.title: Basim Salim
visible_instructors.name: Basim
visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Coach: Launch Your Profitable Online Course

items.headline: Attract, Connect and Sell Exponentially More with Your Ideal Customer Every Single Time by Creating a Customer Avatar.
objectives_summary: The psychology behind turning your product from "nice to have" to a solution your market has the "burning desire" to pay for
Create a customer avatar that represent all of your ideal customer and attract them instantly.
Know how to attract thier ideal customer and create lifetime loyalty.

items.title: Marketing Communication, Messaging and Creative Basics

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores the basic elements of building a full yet simple communication plan.
objectives_summary: Discover the basic elements of a communication plan, audience messaging chart, and creative brief.
Identify and understand the importance of each document and its use.
Explore the different ways to create these documents and then understand how to execute on them.

items.title: Learn how to create a killer Elevator Pitch!
items.headline: How to tell your business story with passion
objectives_summary: Understand how and why the Message Box drives better, more relevant and clear communications
Learn how to write and critique more effective messaging for your marketing campaigns, programs, and activitie
Apply effective messaging techniques to improve lead generation activities.

items.title: Marketing Revealed: How to write marketing copy
items.headline: What you must know before creating your sales pages, landing pages, online ads and promotions
objectives_summary: Create marketing materials directly focused on your customer
Learn how to present your products so that customers see the value in them
Get clear understanding why customers buy products or services

items.title: Sales Funnel Formula: Build Your Silent Sales Machine
items.headline: The Ultimate Sales Funnel Guide to Grow Your Business With Marketing Automation Cracking Your Sales Conversion Code
objectives_summary: You willl know the most systematic way to build trust, to build a relationship and to encourage people to want your brand before making a sale
You will learn why Sales Funnel is the most effective way to build a successful business
You’ll be able to build your own sales funnel from scratch and convert them into paying customers

items.title: Marketing Strategies That Deliver Results
items.headline: Learn laser-focused business marketing strategies and tactics that boost business growth & sales.
objectives_summary: Recognize the importance of prioritization and the pitfalls associated with multitasking in your business
Define the essentials that form the foundation for your success, including your core values, your most profitable products and services, your best customers, and your Unique Value Proposition
Identify your top-priority marketing goal for your business, based on your biggest challenges and your foundation for success

items.title: How to plan an Event or Festival - Masterclass

visible_instructors.title: Jimmy K
visible_instructors.name: Jimmy
visible_instructors.job_title: Music Industry Veteran, Large-Scale Event Pro

items.headline: Large-Scale Event Masterclass
objectives_summary: Large-Scale Event Masterclass that will teach you how to produce "The Big Event", so you can utilize the skills learned for any kind or size event.
The difference between festivals and events.
What kind of time frames are involved in the planning stages?

items.title: The Complete Beginners Guide To Building An Email List
items.headline: The step-by-step dead simple guide to building the most valuable asset in your online business
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will understand the core essentials they need to know to begin building the most valuable asset in their online business
Students will also learn the exact tools I recommend for building a list so they don't have to guess

items.title: Solopreneur Marketing: Find Your Profitable Niche

visible_instructors.title: Lisa Cain, PhD
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Educator & Consultant to Small Business Owners
visible_instructors.name: Lisa

items.headline: Bulls-eye targeting & positioning for more profits! Easy steps from a marketing PhD & business consultant.
objectives_summary: Choose your ideal, most profitable, target clients through an easy process
Communicate their positioning to those clients so they get top dollar for their offers
Understand the process so they can add additional niche markets as they continue to grow.
